other_tests.findings: Bibasilar dependent atelectasis, left greater than right. The liver shows a subcentimeter hypodensity too small to fully characterize. Bilateral parapelvic renal cysts noted. Mild left hydronephrosis and mild delay in excretion in the left kidney compared to the right. Sigmoid colon contains numerous diverticula with circumferential mural thickening and extensive surrounding inflammatory changes. Extraluminal foci of gas with fluid consistent with developing abscess, measuring 5.7 x 4.0 cm. Dilated small bowel loops with a transition point in the lower abdomen consistent with small bowel obstruction. Small amount of perihepatic ascites present.
